Description:
Retail Operation Manager - Fashion (Part-Time)Manage all store operations, optimist sales and profits, control relevant store costs and support and implement Merchandise, Marketing & other in-store initiatives.
Ensure excellent customer service through the implementation of the brand/company guidelines to enhance the shopping/brand experience
Formulate and implement store strategies and procedures

University degree in Business Administration or similar field
